full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` SGROL DKAR YID BZHIN 'KHOR LO'I SGRUB THABS RGYUN KHYER 'CHI MED TSE SBYIN BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @027A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI NI SBYANGS STOBS SOGS YON TAN DU MAS RGYUD PHYUG PA DRUNG PA DPAL LDAN BZANG POS, RGYUN GYI NYAMS LEN 'KHYER BDE BA ZHIG DGOS ZHES BKA' NAN MA CHOG PA'I ZHAL NGOR DUS GSUM SANGS RGYAS THAMS CAD KYI YE SHES KYI SKU GCIG BU, KHYAB BDAG 'KHOR LO'I MGON PO 'JAM DBYANGS MKYEN BRTZE'I DBANG PHYUG GI ZHAL SNGA NAS KYI ZHABS RDUL SPYI BO'I BTZUG GIS MCHOD PA, BKA' 'BANGS THAMS CAD KYI YANG MTHAR GYUR BA RGYAL KHAMS PA'I BANDE DBANG PHYUG RAB BRTAN GYIS SBYAR BA, RJE BLA MA'I BSTAN PA PHYOGS THAMS CAD DU DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG ,)
